mapper.select: select distinct rev.goods_id,rev.review_id,rev.order_id, rev.nick_name,rev.rating,rev.title,rev.content,rev.photo1, li.review_id,count(li.review_id) as count from review as rev join tb_newbee_mall_order_item as ite on ite.order_id=rev.order_id and ite.goods_id=rev.goods_id left join review_like as li on rev.review_id=li.review_id where rev.goods_id=#{goodsId} group by rev.review_id order by rating desc,count desc;

select count(it.goods_id) from tb_newbee_mall_order_item as it left join review as rev on rev.order_id=it.order_id and rev.goods_id=it.goods_id join tb_newbee_mall_order as ord on it.order_id=ord.order_id where rev.order_id is null and user_id=#{userId} and it.goods_id=#{goodsId};

select distinct (select count(rating) from review where rating=5 and goods_id=#{goodsId} ) as rating5, (select count(rating) from review where rating=4 and goods_id=#{goodsId} ) as rating4, (select count(rating) from review where rating=3 and goods_id=#{goodsId} ) as rating3, (select count(rating) from review where rating=2 and goods_id=#{goodsId} ) as rating2, (select count(rating) from review where rating=1 and goods_id=#{goodsId} ) as rating1 from review
select avg(rating) as count_star, count(content) as count_content, count(rating) as count_rating from review where goods_id=#{goodsId}
select count(*) from review_like where user_id=#{userId} and review_id=#{reviewId}
